key.name: base-path
key.summary: The directory in which the tree of notes is stored.

key.name: csd
key.summary: Display a GNOME style CSD title bar instead of deferring to the window manager / gtk fallback.

key.name: syntax-highlighting
key.summary: Enable syntax highlighting in three-backtick code spans, using the languages supported by your system's GtkSourceView (gedit, pluma etc.) setup.

key.name: classic-sidebar
key.summary: If NoteKit should use the "classic" sidebar style, used upto the 8th Dec 2021 or a "slightly more theme-agnostic way".

key.name: colors
key.summary: An array of selected colors specified as a tuple of four doubles, specifying RGBA values between 0 and 1. Each item represents one button within the toolbar.
